examples.example: 我总是喜欢在我的笔记本上记录下生活中的美好瞬间。

translate.english: I always like to record the beautiful moments in life on my notebook.

examples.example: 我把自己的灵感都写在笔记本上，让它们绽放出绚烂的光彩。

translate.english: I write all my inspirations in the notebook to make them bloom with gorgeous brilliance.

examples.example: 我在笔记本上认真写下对未来的美好憧憬。

translate.english: I carefully wrote down the beautiful vision for the future on the notebook.
